text:
And
               
              here
               
              I
               
              prophesy
              :
               
              this
               
              brawl
               
              today
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Grown
               
              to
               
              this
               
              faction
               
              in
               
              the
               
              Temple
               
              garden
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Shall
               
              send
              ,
               
              between
               
              the
               
              red
               
              rose
               
              and
               
              the
               
              white
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
A
               
              thousand
               
              souls
               
              to
               
              death
               
              and
               
              deadly
               
              night
              .

speaker: PLANTAGENET
text:
Good
               
              Master
               
              Vernon
              ,
               
              I
               
              am
               
              bound
               
              to
               
              you
              ,

speaker: PLANTAGENET
text:
That
               
              you
               
              on
               
              my
               
              behalf
               
              would
               
              pluck
               
              a
               
              flower
              .

speaker: VERNON
text:
In
               
              your
               
              behalf
               
              still
               
              will
               
              I
               
              wear
               
              the
               
              same
              .

speaker: LAWYER
text:
And
               
              so
               
              will
               
              I
              .

speaker: PLANTAGENET
text:
Thanks
              ,
               
              gentle
               
              sir
              .

speaker: PLANTAGENET
text:
Come
              ,
               
              let
               
              us
               
              four
               
              to
               
              dinner
              .
               
              I
               
              dare
               
              say

speaker: PLANTAGENET
text:
This
               
              quarrel
               
              will
               
              drink
               
              blood
               
              another
               
              day
              .
